title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Lies about Trump out of control. Trump didn't tear gas protesters, didn't hide in WH bunker. Hillary, Axelrod, Dems tweet image of dark White House from Obama years and say it was Trump hiding in the White House. Esper points out media lies. UK professor Ferguson whose faulty model led to the lockdown now says Sweden's results show the lockdowns were not necessary. Mission of Drive-By Media is to drive wedge between Trump and his base by making you think everyone else hates Trump, blames him for everything, disapproves of everything. It's not true. Van Jones warns Democrats that Trump voters were reassured by Trump's trip to St. John's church. Caller is demoralized by what she sees in the media.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Obama to address the nation at 5PM, Drive-Bys will praise him for unity. Rush counsels caller who is depressed because she feels we're losing America. Turn off media for a week and you'll feel much better. President Trump called Rush right after his walk to St. John's church. Trump isn't going to give up, and you shouldn't either. We have the ability to save the country from liberalism with massive turnout in November. Rush's prediction from 2014 that Obama would be treated as if he's still president during the next president's term. Obama to upstage Biden's race speech. Democrats are mad as hell that they can't get rid of Trump with lies the way Harry Reid dispatched Mitt Romney. What blue states governors and mayors want. New York is example of what America will be if Biden wins.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Senate Rosenstein hearing. Did Rosenstein really throw McCabe under the bus? Blue states want a bailout, want Trump to send in National Guard so somebody will die and they can blame it on Trump. Former Obama/Bush Chairman of Joint Chiefs denounces Trump, is a deep state political general, never supported Trump. Does the economy need New York and California to recover? Maybe not. Markets shrugging off coronavirus. Rosenstein admits he knew in August 2017 there was nothing to the collusion allegations. Barr and Durham will act before election. Markets up because they think riots have ensured Trump's reelection.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
